mapper.select: SELECT d.DEPT_NAME AS dname, j.JOB_NAME AS jname, ui.USER_IMG, ui.USER_ID, ui.USER_NAME FROM user_info ui JOIN dept d ON ui.USER_DEPT = d.DEPT_NO JOIN job j ON ui.USER_JOB = j.JOB_NO WHERE ui.USER_ID = '${loginId}'

SELECT d.DEPT_NAME AS dname, j.JOB_NAME AS jname, ui.USER_IMG, ui.USER_ID, ui.USER_NAME FROM user_info ui JOIN dept d ON ui.USER_DEPT = d.DEPT_NO JOIN job j ON ui.USER_JOB = j.JOB_NO WHERE d.DEPT_NAME = '${dept_name}' order by JOB_ORDER desc
select DEPT_NAME from dept order by DEPT_NAME asc
select user_id, user_name, user_job, user_dept from user_info where user_id != #{loginId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT_FORM ( DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE, DOCUMENT_TITLE, DOCUMENT_CATEGORY_NUM, USER_ID, DOCUMENT_FORM_DATE, DOCUMENT_STATE, APPROVAL_NOW_LEVEL, SERIALNUMBER ) VALUES ( #{DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE}, #{DOCUMENT_TITLE}, #{DOCUMENT_CATEGORY_NUM}, #{USER_ID}, SYSDATE, 0, 1, doc_seq.NEXTVAL )

INSERT INTO APPROVAL_LINE ( APPROVAL_NUM, DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE, APPROVAL_USER_ID, APPROVAL_DATE, APPROVAL_STATE, APPROVAL_LEVEL ) VALUES ( approval_seq.NEXTVAL, #{DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE}, #{APPROVAL_USER_ID}, SYSDATE, 0, #{APPROVAL_LEVEL}
)

INSERT INTO BSTRIP ( DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE, BSTRIPDATE, BSTRIPDESTINATION, BSTRIPSTOPOVER, BSTRIPLOCATION, BSTRIPLOCATIONBSCONTENT, BSTRIPPERDIEM, BSTRIPROOMCHARGE, BSTRIPTRANSPORTATIONCOST, BSTRIPEXTRACOST, BSTRIPALLCOST ) VALUES ( #{DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE}, #{bstripDate}, #{bstripDestination}, #{bstripStopOver}, #{bstripLocation}, #{bsContent}, #{bstripPerDiem}, #{bstripRoomCharge}, #{bstripTransportationCost}, #{bstripExtraCost}, #{bstripAllCost}
)
mapper.select: SELECT AL.APPROVAL_OPINION, AL.APPROVAL_DATE, AL.APPROVAL_STATE, UI.USER_CARD FROM USER_INFO UI INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LINE AL ON UI.USER_ID = AL.APPROVAL_USER_ID WHERE APPROVAL_NUM = #{apNumVal}

SELECT AL.APPROVAL_NUM, AL.DOCUMENT_FORM_CODE, UI.USER_CARD, UI.USER_NAME, CASE WHEN UI.USER_DEPT = DP.DEPT_NO THEN DP.DEPT_NAME ELSE '' END AS USER_DEPT, CASE WHEN UI.USER_JOB = JB.JOB_NO THEN JB.JOB_NAME ELSE '' END AS USER_JOB, AL.APPROVAL_DATE, AL.APPROVAL_STATE FROM USER_INFO UI INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LINE AL ON UI.USER_ID = AL.APPROVAL_USER_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT DP ON UI.USER_DEPT = DP.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN JOB JB ON UI.USER_JOB = JB.JOB_NO ORDER BY AL.APPROVAL_LEVEL ASC

SELECT AL.APPROVAL_NUM, UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_CARD, CASE WHEN UI.USER_DEPT = DP.DEPT_NO THEN DP.DEPT_NAME ELSE '' END AS USER_DEPT, CASE WHEN UI.USER_JOB = JB.JOB_NO THEN JB.JOB_NAME ELSE '' END AS USER_JOB, AL.APPROVAL_DATE, AL.APPROVAL_STATE, AL.APPROVAL_OPINION FROM USER_INFO UI INNER JOIN APPROVAL_LINE AL ON UI.USER_ID = AL.APPROVAL_USER_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT DP ON UI.USER_DEPT = DP.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN JOB JB ON UI.USER_JOB = JB.JOB_NO WHERE AL.APPROVAL_NUM = #{APPROVAL_NUM} ORDER BY AL.APPROVAL_DATE ASC
